name: Reverse Trivia
description:
Challange your friends in this trivia battle where everyone can be a winner. The host will use the "Reverse Trivia" launcher, while the contestants use the buzzer app to connect and play. Using an online communication app (like Discord) is highly recommended.

One player is the host, controlling the game board, gives points and overall, controls the game rules. The other 3 players will be presented an answer, and will have to press the buzzer as fast as they can, and then try to answer the phrase with the proper question.

The game files are in "C:\Users\*UserName*\AppData\Local\Reverse_Trivia". There you can edit the entries and make your own themes and questions. ( you need to open the game once in order for them to be created)
